verses.verse: And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> is the <S%H1612>vine<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%> more than <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H6086>tree,<s%> or than a <S%H2156>branch<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is among the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest?<s%>

Shall <S%H6086>wood<s%> be <S%H3947>taken<s%> thereof to <S%H6213>do<s%> any <S%H4399>work?<s%> or will men <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H3489>pin<s%> of it to <S%H8518>hang<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%> <S%H5921>thereon?<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> it is <S%H5414>cast<s%> into the <S%H784>fire<s%> for <S%H402>fuel;<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H398>devours<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> the <S%H7098>ends<s%> of it, and the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of it is <S%H2787>burned.<s%> Is it <S%H6743>meet<s%> for any <S%H4399>work?<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> when it was <S%H8549>whole,<s%> it was <S%H6213>meet<s%> for <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4399>work:<s%> <S%H637>how<s%> <S%H637>much<s%> <S%H3588><s%> less shall it be <S%H6213>meet<s%> yet for any <S%H4399>work,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> has <S%H398>devoured<s%> it, and it is <S%H2787>burned?<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> As the <S%H1612>vine<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%> among the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> to the <S%H784>fire<s%> for <S%H402>fuel,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

And I will <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> against them; they shall <S%H3318>go<s%> out from one <S%H784>fire,<s%> and another <S%H784>fire<s%> shall <S%H398>devour<s%> them; and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> when I <S%H7760>set<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> against them.

And I will <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H8077>desolate,<s%> <S%H3282>because<s%> they have <S%H4603>committed<s%> a <S%H4604>trespass,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>
